body_html: My prior would be that if TF transpose + NCHW + unTranspose were faster, then Nvidia would do that under the surface (which may in fact be what they do). Given that the default layout in TF is NCHW, seems reasonable to see if this path can be made faster.
body_text: My prior would be that if TF transpose + NCHW + unTranspose were faster, then Nvidia would do that under the surface (which may in fact be what they do). Given that the default layout in TF is NCHW, seems reasonable to see if this path can be made faster.
body: My prior would be that if TF transpose + NCHW + unTranspose were faster, then Nvidia would do that under the surface (which may in fact be what they do). Given that the default layout in TF is `NCHW`, seems reasonable to see if this path can be made faster.
